subject: Football
lead_paragraph: If the Patriots can defeat Jacksonville on Saturday, their winning streak will reach 19 -- the jersey number transposed of Marquise Hill, the team’s 24-year-old reserve defensive lineman who drowned in late May.
snippet: If the Patriots can defeat Jacksonville on Saturday, their winning streak will reach 19 -- the jersey number transposed of Marquise Hill, the team’s 24-year-old reserve defensive lineman who drowned in late May.
